t: Amazon Renewed: Shop Refurbished, Pre-Owned and Open-Box Products

t: How to list a brand new item that has damaged package?
s: I’ve been assuming that “Used-Like New” (with a note something like “Brand new product, minor package damage”) would be acceptable to use for a brand new item that has minor damage to outside packaging. But, after looking at the condition guidelines, that doesn’t seem to be the case.
